data.neighbors

Interface NSFUserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaBoostM2, ANHBNN, AntiHub, Carving, CBWkNN, CNN, DBScan, DWHFNN, DWHFNNBoostable, ENRBF, FastABOD, FNN, GCNN, GHPC, GHPKM, GKH, HFNN, HFNNBoostable, HIKNN, HIKNNBoostable, HIKNNNonDW, HMScore, HwKNN, HwKNNBoostable, INSIGHT, IPT_RT3, IterativeCaseFiltering, LDOF, NHBNN, RandomSelector, RNNR_AL1, RRKNN, Wilson72

    public interface NSFUserInterface
    This interface defines passing of the kNN sets and the associated statistics within the experimental framework.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNeighborhoodSize()
      This method asks the NSF user to declare its preferred neighborhood size.
      NeighborSetFinder getNSF() 
      void noRecalcs()
      Indicating that the object is shared and no recalculations can be done on it for synchronization purposes.
      void setNSF(NeighborSetFinder nsf) 

    • Method Detail

      • setNSF

        void setNSF(NeighborSetFinder nsf)
        Parameters:
        nsf - NeighborSetFinder object for calculating and holding kNN sets.

      • getNSF

        NeighborSetFinder getNSF()
        Returns:
        NeighborSetFinder object for calculating and holding kNN sets.

      • noRecalcs

        void noRecalcs()
        Indicating that the object is shared and no recalculations can be done on it for synchronization purposes. An empty implementation is appropriate in methods that do not modify the NeighborSetFinder object's content.

      • getNeighborhoodSize

        int getNeighborhoodSize()
        This method asks the NSF user to declare its preferred neighborhood size.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the neighborhood size needed for NSF calculations.
